page.title: 01 A Guide To Alveston
page.content: Alveston is a large village in the north of Avon.It is placed on a limestone ridge above the River Severn.It is surrounded by countryside which makes it a lovely place for a walk ,nature studies or just running around.On a walk in Alveston's countryside you might walk up one of the steep hills.From the top of the hills there is a great view of the Severn Bridge and Wales.There has not been any big industrial development in Alveston.Houses have not been built in great quantities in Alveston since the 1960's when a large amount of houses were built.Since the 1960's most of the plans of expanding Alveston have been turned down.Alveston is not expected to grow a great deal for quite a long time.
